Comment: This is, of course, simply Trump being Trump.  You can't take anything he says at face value, because he is constantly lying or exaggerating. What he says today will invariably have no connection with the truth and indeed absolutely no connection with what he says tomorrow or the day after.  Such an approach might be considered amusing if he were a retired bus driver, but as the President of the US dealing with major global issues on a round-the-clock basis, it is massively problematic, hugely dangerous and grotesquely embarrassing.  He urgently needs to be impeached.
